actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize certain revenues from leases on the Outer Continental Shelf to be made available to coastal and other States.

summary.text: Provides, under the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act, that specified revenues from leases on the Outer Continental Shelf shall be made available to the States on the following basis: (1) 50 percent to the State adjacent to the Outer Continental Shelf; (2) 25 percent, in equal amounts, to each State other than the adjacent State; and (3) 25 percent to be deposited in the Treasury of the United States and credited to miscellaneous receipts. (Amends 43 U.S.C. 1338)

titles.title: A bill to authorize certain revenues from leases on the Outer Continental Shelf to be made available to coastal and other States.
